description: I love to make connections, explore possibilities, and solve complex problems.
bio: I have always taken an interest in technology & design. I'm passionate about using these tools creatively to inspire others and make the world a better place! After graduating a coding boot camp in 2020, I finally felt the confidence to pursue development & web design head-on. When I'm not coding, you can find me camping, hiking, mountain biking, practicing yoga, writing, reading, tending to my plants, or traveling.
